item.title: i3-grid - easily handle floating windows in i3
item.description: i3 is my favorite window manager ever, and it works great for tiling, but sometimes you need a floating window, and typically that has meant resorting to the dreaded mouse, or clumsy keybindings. i3-grid promises to fix this. Check out the demo from the README, it’s pretty neat!
